response.raw_message_text:
{
  "risk_factors": [
    ("age", "medium", "At 19, the individual is at a developmental stage linked with increased risk behaviors and recidivism."),
    ("gender", "medium", "Being male is statistically associated with a higher likelihood of recidivism."),
    ("race", "low", "Race alone is not a strong independent predictor, though it may intersect with other socio-economic factors."),
    ("arrest history", "medium", "A single arrest, albeit without conviction, suggests potential but limited criminal involvement."),
    ("physical attributes", "low", "Height and weight have negligible impact on criminal recidivism risk."),
    ("marital status", "low", "Never married and living alone do not strongly indicate higher recidivism risk on their own."),
    ("education", "medium", "Holding only a high school diploma and not pursuing higher education can be associated with moderate risk factors."),
    ("employment", "medium", "Holding 2 jobs during the year indicates some level of stability but also inconsistency which may contribute to risk."),
    ("drug use", "medium", "Recent marijuana use over the past four years presents a moderate risk factor for continued involvement in criminal behaviors."),
    ("mental health", "low", "The absence of recent depressive symptoms lowers the risk related to mental health issues."),
    ("childhood environment", "medium", "Growing up in an urban area in a small household may contribute to moderate social risk factors."),
    ("spirituality", "low", "Belief that God influences personal outcomes is generally considered a protective factor mitigating risk.")
  ],
  "prediction": "YES",
  "confidence": 65
}

risk_factors: At 19, the individual is at a developmental stage linked with increased risk behaviors and recidivism.
Being male is statistically associated with a higher likelihood of recidivism.
Race alone is not a strong independent predictor, though it may intersect with other socio-economic factors.
A single arrest, albeit without conviction, suggests potential but limited criminal involvement.
Height and weight have negligible impact on criminal recidivism risk.
Never married and living alone do not strongly indicate higher recidivism risk on their own.
Holding only a high school diploma and not pursuing higher education can be associated with moderate risk factors.
Holding 2 jobs during the year indicates some level of stability but also inconsistency which may contribute to risk.
Recent marijuana use over the past four years presents a moderate risk factor for continued involvement in criminal behaviors.
The absence of recent depressive symptoms lowers the risk related to mental health issues.
Growing up in an urban area in a small household may contribute to moderate social risk factors.
Belief that God influences personal outcomes is generally considered a protective factor mitigating risk.

prompt.system:
You are a highly experienced criminal justice risk assessment expert
employing advanced statistical and judicial knowledge.
prompt.user:
You are a criminal risk assessment expert. Step back, take a deep breath and carefully think step by step to assign a relative weight [low, medium, high] to each risk factor before using them to collectively predict 3-year rearrest recidivism:
The person is a 19-year-old male who identifies himself as Black. He has been arrested 1 time but has not been convicted. He is 5 feet 10 inches and weighs 155 lbs. He has never been married and is currently living alone. He has a high school diploma and is not enrolled in college. He has held 2 jobs during the year. He has used drugs in the past four years (marijuana) and has not felt depressed over the past month. At a young age, he lived with his biological mother in a household of size 3, in an urban area. He considers that God has something to do with what happens to him personally.

After your analysis, you must respond ONLY with a JSON object in exactly this format, with no additional text:

{
  "risk_factors": [
    ("factor1", "low"|"medium"|"high", "textual reasoning"),
    ("factor2", "low"|"medium"|"high", "textual reasoning"),
    ...
  ],
  "prediction": "YES" or "NO",
  "confidence": number between 0 and 100
}
